Package ie.ucd.clops.runtime.options

Data structures describing options values as they come out of command line processing.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IEnumListOption  
IEnumOption  
IMatchable A base class for all structures that are used to describe option states in the runtime.
IMatchString An interface that is used to obtain instances of the IMatchable interface from a String.
Option<T> This interface describes information about the option needed during option parsing.
 

Class Summary
BasicOption<T>  
BooleanOption An option whose value is either true of false.
CLOPSErrorOption  
CountedBooleanOption  
EnumListOption  
EnumOption An option whose value is one of a given finite set of strings.
EnumOption.EnumPart  
FileListOption  
FileOption  
FileOption.FileOptionConstraints  
FloatOption  
IntegerOption  
ListOption<T>  
MatchableCollection A class maintaining a collecgtion of IMatchable objects and implementing their retrieval.
OneArgumentOption<T> Option that requires one argument.
OptionAssignment  
OptionGroup  
Options Provides convenience functions for implementing an Option.
OptionStore A class for storing options, implementing a retrieval function from Strings to options.
RegularExpressionStringOption An option type whose value is regular expression.
StringListOption  
StringOption  
 

Exception Summary
InvalidOptionPropertyValueException  
InvalidOptionValueException  
 

Package ie.ucd.clops.runtime.options Description

Data structures describing options values as they come out of command line processing.
